00026 #ifndef __GLPBUFFER_H__
00027 #define __GLPBUFFER_H__
00028 
00029 #include "OgreGLPrerequisites.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00035     class GLPBuffer
00036     {
00037     public:
00038         GLPBuffer(PixelComponentType format, size_t width, size_t height);
00039         virtual ~GLPBuffer();
00040         
00043         virtual GLContext *getContext() = 0;
00044         
00045         PixelComponentType getFormat() { return mFormat; }
00046         size_t getWidth() { return mWidth; }
00047         size_t getHeight() { return mHeight; }
00048         
00051         static PixelComponentType getPixelComponentType(PixelFormat fmt);
00052     protected:
00053         PixelComponentType mFormat;
00054         size_t mWidth, mHeight;
00055     };
00056
